name: Always Been You
lyrics:
编曲 : Lunak
词曲来源于@SPLICE，已获商用授权，未经著作权人许可禁止搬运、翻录、Remix。
hey hey hey~
And we can’t live a lie
我们无法活在谎言中
In between you and I, there’s always love we had
你我之间曾经的那份爱 似乎从未消失过
And it’s always been you
我一直想念着你
You oh oh oh
It's always,it's always,it's always been you
一直，一直，一直都是你
You oh oh oh
It's always,it's always,it's always been you
一直，一直，一直都是你
It’s been a while since I’ve seen your face
时光飞逝 很久未再见到你的脸
How you been?
你过的好吗？
I’ll admit, I really missed this place
我承认，我深切思念着这片回忆之地
Just so you know, you haven’t been replaced
我想告诉你 你不曾被任何人取代
Cause I still think of you now
即使此刻我依然追忆着你
Like we’ve been estranged
仿佛我们从未离开过彼此
It’s been a while since I’ve seen your face
有一段时间 没再看到你的脸
How you been?
你过的好吗？
I’ll admit, I really missed this place
我承认，我思念着这片回忆之地
Just so you know, you haven’t been replaced
你从不曾被任何人取代
Cause I still think of you now
即使此刻 我依然追忆着你
Like we’ve been estranged
仿佛我们会永远在一起
收起
